title: COMPANY overview page » Preview IMAGES
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see a preview image for each COMPANY on the overview page\
So I can quickly find a specific one without knowing its name
description:
* each COMPANY item on the COMPANY overview page contains a preview image
* the “preview image” refers to what is known as “prime image” in the API 
* the preview image is displayed in thumbnail size
* when a COMPANY has no prime image then the preview image shows the default fallback image
